name: BurglarDeterrent
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: burglar deterrent
des:
Scare off burglars when you are away from home. Burglar Deterrent simulates ambience noises for your home. For example: a kitchen, a living room, a bathroom or a garage. The sound effects are automatically looped and they will play until you say "pause" or "stop". At anytime you will be able skip to the next sound by saying "next" or to go back by saying "previous".

You can say:
1) protect the garage
2) protect the kitchen
3) protect the bathroom
4) protect the living room
5) play dinner party sounds
6) play crowd sounds
7) barking dog (guard dog)

 ✶✶✶✶✶✶✶✶PREMIUM FEATURES✶✶✶✶✶✶✶✶
Burglar Deterrent Premium unlocks access to:
► TIMER MODE - set a timer for your burglar deterrent sounds (for example a timer for 48 hours will play a looped sound of your choice for two days!) 
► RANDOM MODE - play all available sounds in loop randomly to simulate even more realistic ambient sounds 
► NEW SOUNDS - gain access the following sounds: 
- British conversation
- crying baby
- drilling sounds
- hammering sounds
- office sounds
- laughing sounds

If you like this skill, please leave a review in your Alexa App.

FEEDBACK
For feature requests or sounds wishes, please leave a comment below!
Icon made by Gregor Cesnar from Flaticon
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
